title: (x) Social Trends/Slow Runner/Digital Type - Black Jack/Sarah Script/custom? {Rainer, Lex}
content:
Any IDs on any of these would be appreciated thanks!  
Josh

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_0.jpg) | 36.27 KB |
| [Picture 4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_0.jpg) | 18.4 KB |
| [Picture 6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%206.jpg) | 50.42 KB |
author: scruggsdesign

comments.content:
Slow Runner probably was born as [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/sarah-script/).  
Social Trend is [Black Jack](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/black-jack/) by Ronna Penner.

Picture 4 is [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/charlesborges/sarahscript.shtml) with modified "S" and "R".

- Lex

Thanks Renko and Lex. Picture 6 is from Hannes Famira's PDF on his class at the Cooper Union (if that helps)... [http://www.typedu.org/frontDoor/typeClassForm.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084239/http:/www.typedu.org/frontDoor/typeClassForm.pdf "http://www.typedu.org/frontDoor/typeClassForm.pdf")

Aha, well, as Hannes Famira is a Typedesigner and the PDF shows the embedded typefaces as InterPol-Book, -SemiBold, -BookSc, -Medium; InterSerif-BoldSC, -LightSC, -BlackItalic and -Medium I'd say this is a custom typeface, maybe the InterSerif BlackItalic. Unfortunately their fontsite is down for rethinking. What me puzzles is that I was sure I've seen the typeface before, but you know, can't remember ... and don't know if I am mistaken. Wait, please, until the experts show up.

Duh!! I forget I can look at the embedded typefaces in PDFs. Too bad the sites down I REALY like it. Thanks for the sleuthing.  
josh
